text: Title page of Orazio Torsellino's Histoire universelle, 1708 Orazio Torsellino (1545–1599), known in Latin as Horatius Torsellinus, was an Italian historian and man of letters. He wrote books on Christianity, world history, and Latin grammar. ==References== *Sowerby, E.M. Catalogue of the Library of Thomas Jefferson, 1952, v. 1, p. 22 ==External links== *Orazio Torsellini in the Historical Archives of the Pontifical Gregorian University Category:1545 births Category:1599 deaths Category:Italian Renaissance humanists Category:Jesuit historiography
title: Orazio Torsellino
